007package imagingbook.violajones.lib;
008
009import java.awt.Rectangle;
010
011/**
012 * Merely a rectangle which can check for overlap with another rectangle.
013 *
014 * @author WB
015 */
016public class FaceRegion extends Rectangle {
017        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
018
019        FaceRegion(int x, int y, int w, int h) {
020                super(x, y, w, h);
021        }
022        
023        // TODO: check!!
024        boolean overlaps(Rectangle r2, double sizeFac) {
025                final double sizeFac1 = 1 + sizeFac;
026                int distance = (int) (this.width * sizeFac);
027                if (r2.x <= this.x + distance && r2.x >= this.x - distance
028                                && r2.y <= this.y + distance && r2.y >= this.y - distance
029                                && r2.width <= (int) (this.width * sizeFac1)
030                                && (int) (r2.width * sizeFac1) >= this.width) {
031                        return true;
032                }
033                if (this.x >= r2.x && this.x + this.width <= r2.x + r2.width && this.y >= r2.y
034                                && this.y + this.height <= r2.y + r2.height) {
035                        return true;
036                }
037                        
038                return false;
039        }
040
041}
